mapper.select: SELECT A.QNA_BOARD_NUM AS QNA_BOARD_NUM , A.USER_ID AS USER_ID , A.QNA_BOARD_CONTENT AS QNA_BOARD_CONTENT , A.QNA_BOARD_DATE AS QNA_BOARD_DATE , B.QNA_REPLY_NUM AS QNA_REPLY_NUM , B.REPLY_USER_ID AS REPLY_USER_ID , B.QNA_REPLY_CONTENT AS QNA_REPLY_CONTENT , B.QNA_REPLY_DATE AS QNA_REPLY_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(QNA_REPLY_NUM) FROM CMIS_QNA_REPLY C WHERE C.QNA_BOARD_NUM = A.QNA_BOARD_NUM) AS QNA_REPLY_COUNT FROM CMIS_QNA_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN CMIS_QNA_REPLY B ON A.QNA_BOARD_NUM = B.QNA_BOARD_NUM
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CMIS_QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_BOARD_NUM = #{qna_board_num} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE CMIS_QNA_BOARD SET QNA_BOARD_CONTENT = #{qna_board_content} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND QNA_BOARD_NUM = #{qna_board_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMIS_QNA_REPLY(REPLY_USER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_DATE, QNA_BOARD_NUM) VALUES(#{reply_user_id},#{qna_reply_content},DATE_ADD(current_timestamp(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR),#{qna_board_num})
